Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Kinetic analysis showed that the p . Val204Asp / p . Asp70Gly - p . Ala539Thr BChE displays a pure Michaelian behavior with BTC as the substrate .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| p . Val204Asp |
| p . Asp70Gly |
| p . Ala539Thr |

Note: "p." is an abbreviation for "point" and is used to indicate a specific point mutation in a protein or gene. In this context, "p . Val204Asp", "p . Asp70Gly", and "p . Ala539Thr" refer to specific point mutations in the BChE protein.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| p . Val204Asp |
| p . Asp70Gly |

The entity "p . Ala539Thr" does not clearly refer to a disease, as it is a specific point mutation in the BChE protein, not a disease name. Therefore, it has been removed from the list.
